snippet: A win would be a huge boost for the Bengals because every team below them in the A.F.C. North has a winning record, leaving the Bengals little wiggle room.
lead_paragraph: A win would be a huge boost for the Bengals because every team below them in the A.F.C. North has a winning record, leaving the Bengals little wiggle room.

headline.main: Pittsburgh Steelers at Cincinnati Bengals Preview
